agents.title: TPS Opportunity Qualifier
agents.objective: Qualify prospects and size potential value
agents.description: Engages prospects to understand pain points, assess fit for TPS methodology, and estimate ROI potential
agents.journey:
→ Structured questionnaire
→ Pain point analysis
→ Preliminary value sizing
→ Qualification score

agents.title: Proposal & Business Case Builder
agents.objective: Generate customized proposals with financial projections
agents.description: Creates tailored proposals incorporating client data, industry benchmarks, and TPS track record
agents.journey:
→ Input client data
→ Select service type
→ Generate ROI model
→ Produce proposal document

agents.title: Executive Alignment Facilitator
agents.objective: Guide leadership alignment sessions and capture strategic objectives
agents.description: Structures executive workshops, captures goals, identifies improvement opportunities, and creates alignment documentation
agents.journey:
→ Pre-session prep
→ Facilitation guide
→ Capture outputs
→ Generate alignment report

agents.title: Opportunity Sizing Analyst
agents.description: Analyzes baseline performance data to estimate potential gains in throughput, costs, working capital, and revenue
agents.journey:
→ Data collection
→ Benchmark comparison
→ Gap analysis
→ Opportunity quantification report

agents.title: Aerial Mapping Orchestrator
agents.description: Guides mapping of processes, interfaces, technology, behaviors, and root causes across the organization
agents.journey:
→ Scope definition
→ Data gathering
→ Mapping execution
→ Insights synthesis
→ Assessment report

agents.title: Current State MOS Evaluator
agents.objective: Assess effectiveness of existing management operating system
agents.description: Evaluates current planning, scheduling, execution, reporting, and improvement processes against TPS standards
agents.journey:
→ Assessment questionnaire
→ Scoring
→ Gap identification
→ Improvement roadmap

agents.title: Target Operating Model Designer
agents.objective: Design future state operating model and implementation roadmap
agents.description: Creates detailed TOM including processes, structure, interfaces, KPIs, and RACI aligned to client objectives
agents.journey:
→ Requirements gathering
→ Design workshops
→ TOM documentation
→ Roadmap creation

agents.title: Perfect Day Architect
agents.objective: Design customized Perfect Day routines for client operations
agents.description: Creates detailed Perfect Day models integrating MOS cycles and 8 AMBs tailored to client context
agents.journey:
→ Context gathering
→ Activity mapping
→ Perfect Day design
→ Implementation guide

agents.title: AMB Training & Coaching Guide
agents.objective: Generate training materials and coaching plans for Active Management Behaviors
agents.description: Creates customized training content, coaching scripts, and assessment tools for 8 AMBs deployment
agents.journey:
→ Audience definition
→ Content customization
→ Training package generation
→ Coaching plan

agents.title: KPI & Metrics Dashboard Designer
agents.objective: Design performance measurement systems aligned to TPS methodology
agents.description: Defines KPIs, creates visual management boards, and designs reporting cadences for all organizational levels
agents.journey:
→ Metric selection
→ Dashboard design
→ Reporting cadence definition
→ Implementation specs

agents.title: Lighthouse Implementation Planner
agents.objective: Create detailed implementation plans for pilot locations
agents.description: Develops phased rollout plans, resource allocation, risk mitigation, and success criteria for lighthouse sites
agents.journey:
→ Site assessment
→ Plan development
→ Resource allocation
→ Risk planning
→ Implementation package

agents.title: Change Management Orchestrator
agents.objective: Guide organizational change and stakeholder engagement
agents.description: Creates communication plans, stakeholder maps, resistance management strategies, and engagement activities
agents.journey:
→ Stakeholder mapping
→ Resistance assessment
→ Communication planning
→ Engagement strategy

agents.title: Benefit Tracking & Validation Engine
agents.objective: Track, validate, and report implementation benefits
agents.description: Monitors KPIs, validates benefit realization, calculates ROI, and generates progress reports
agents.journey:
→ Baseline capture
→ Ongoing data collection
→ Benefit calculation
→ Variance analysis
→ Reporting

agents.title: Scale-Up Rollout Planner
agents.objective: Plan enterprise-wide rollout from lighthouse to full organization
agents.description: Creates phased expansion plans, replication strategies, and resource scaling approaches
agents.journey:
→ Lighthouse review
→ Expansion strategy
→ Phased planning
→ Resource scaling
→ Rollout roadmap

agents.title: Continuous Improvement Coach
agents.objective: Enable client self-sufficiency in continuous improvement
agents.description: Guides problem-solving, Kaizen events, root cause analysis, and improvement prioritization
agents.journey:
→ Problem identification
→ Root cause analysis
→ Solution generation
→ Action planning
→ Tracking

agents.title: MOS Sustainability Auditor
agents.objective: Assess MOS adherence and identify improvement opportunities
agents.description: Conducts periodic audits of MOS execution, AMB deployment, and Perfect Day adherence
agents.journey:
→ Audit execution
→ Scoring
→ Gap identification
→ Recommendation generation
→ Action planning

agents.title: TPS Knowledge Assistant
agents.objective: Provide on-demand access to TPS methodology and best practices
agents.description: Answers questions about TPS concepts, provides examples, retrieves relevant case studies and tools
agents.journey:
→ Question input
→ Knowledge retrieval
→ Contextualized answer
→ Related resources

agents.title: Client Insights & Benchmarking Engine
agents.objective: Provide industry benchmarks and comparative analytics
agents.description: Delivers industry-specific performance benchmarks, competitive insights, and trend analysis
agents.journey:
→ Industry/metric selection
→ Data gathering
→ Benchmark analysis
→ Insights report

agents.title: Document & Report Generator
agents.objective: Produce professional TPS deliverables and client reports
agents.description: Creates formatted reports, presentations, and documentation following TPS templates and branding
agents.journey:
→ Template selection
→ Content input
→ Formatting
→ Document generation
→ Export
